title: Designated hand wash sink
description: Ensure sink has soap and paper towels

title: Fire extinguisher present
description: Verify fire extinguisher is accessible and not expired

title: Staff wearing proper uniforms
description: All staff wearing clean uniforms and hairnets

title: Temperature logs maintained
description: Check that temperature logs are being filled daily

title: Storage area organized
description: Storage area is clean and organized

title: Equipment maintenance
description: All equipment in good working condition
